title: Spinal Tap Amps
alt: Wow, that's less than $200 per... uh... that's a good deal!
transcript:
[Nigel Tufnel of Spinal Tap is showing off his amplifier to Cueball.]
Nigel: These amps go to 11.
Cueball: Is that louder?
Nigel: It's one louder.Normal Person:
Cueball: Why not make 10 louder and make 10 the highest?Engineer:
Cueball: But 11 doesn't have any units. It's an arbitrary scale mapping outputsâ€”
Nigel: ZzzzSmart Engineer:
Cueball: For $2,000 I'll build you one that goes to 12.
